hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "$(date) - make update" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && \ make update echo "$(date) - make update - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=ar71xx-generic echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=ar71xx-nand echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=brcm2708-bcm2708 echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=brcm2708-bcm2709 echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=mpc85xx-generic echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=x86-64 echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=x86-generic echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=x86-kvm_guest echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

export GLUON_TARGET=x86-xen_domu echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon && make -j $(nproc) clean && make -j $(nproc) echo "$(date) - make target $GLUON_TARGET - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt

echo "$(date) - finalize" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt cd $WORKSPACE/gluon/output/images/factory && \ md5sum -b * > md5.txt && \ cd $WORKSPACE/gluon/output/images/sysupgrade && \ md5sum -b * > md5.txt && \ make -C $WORKSPACE/gluon manifest GLUON_BRANCH=stable && \ 7za a -t7z -mx=9 -ms=on $WORKSPACE/images.7z $WORKSPACE/gluon/output/images/ echo "$(date) - finalize - done" >> $WORKSPACE/timing.txt
